title: keyboard instability
content:
I had to change my email. It got so I couldnt see what I had typed as the screen was unreliable and blocked by the keyboard frequently. My new email worked well for a week. Now it has relearned its old habits. Its unreliable, frequently blocking content on the screen, making the phone unusable for mail. I cant get the keyboard off the center of the screen. And it constantly reappears making use of the phone impossible. Everyone points a finger a someone else 

The manufacturer of the phone blames my carrier who blames the software developer, who blames the updates and add ons. It has turned into a POS in one week. If I could find out who is responsible for this mess, I would gladly put a bullet in his or her head. Why cant I get the keyboard off my messages?
creator: sallyjuneodland

title: malware not in add-ons
content:
Note': Such problems do exist when all add-ons disabled and in safe mode Firefox (by "refresh firefox" option).

When Firefox is started, an advertising window would occur. The hijacked address: hijacked address

Also, Ctrl + Shift + N was hijacked to the same window.

The window is strange: When I click the "+" button to open a new tab, the new tab directly opens in the previous window.

Perhaps something in Firefox itself was maliciously modified, I guess.

I am using 88.0.1 (64-bit) version Firefox on Win10.
creator: kakakali

title: Recuperar Sync
content: Atualizei a senha do Sync mas meus conteúdos não apareceram, mesmo usando o mesmo e-mail. Ajudem por favor.

title: I set my homepage for any new tab I want to keep open through all sessions.  Since the latest update to v88, when I try to access my homepage in a new tab, multiple tabs open.  If I click the homepage again, more tabs open.  How to stop this?
content: Tell me how to rectify this problem. Thanks.
creator: mnosera
